list.name: Default
list.comment: Made Gun and Interface with SimpleGun inheriting from it.

MESSAGE.value: Added Main Class to run game
Added throwGrenade() to character, called in main to test
Civilian class added, base class methods were overrided, tested in main
Added Hostage class, methods overrided again....tested in main
Strategy Pattern implemented. Changeable behaviour removed from Character. Tested in main
Added 3 classes, Vehicle, ArmouredCar and Tank Modified Main to test new classes
User input now accepted to dynamically choose Vehicle
Added the VehicleFactory and removed code from Main to createVehicle method. Code is now refactored
Extended Factory Pattern further as different vehicles were required to be created for both the Main Character and the Enemy. Refactor complete
Added Gun and ModifiedGun...tested from Main. This is not very flexible as we may want to add more mods to the weapon dynamically and with ease

Made Gun and Interface with SimpleGun implementing it. Created a Decorator class, ModDecorator which also implements Gun and has a Gun reference. Created several types of Mods, Scope etc. Changed Main to test. Refactoring complete.
John suggests using final integers to solve the health issue
Toms suggestion to use an Enumeration for the Health state
Enum code complete in Main Application
Added gotShot and collectedFirstAidKit to Character, tested in Main Application
Refactored code to the State Pattern

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Refactored code to the State Pattern
